text: Chantal Reuter (born 5 May 1978) is a Dutch former professional tennis player. Born in Amsterdam, Reuter won the girls' doubles title at the 1994 US Open (with Surina De Beer). Reuter, a right-handed player, competed briefly on the professional tour in the early 1990s, where she won three ITF singles titles and reached a best ranking of 408 in the world. ==ITF finals== ===Singles: 3 (3–0)=== {|class="sortable wikitable" style=font-size:97% |- !
